name: Mirror Guardian
description:
Made for the first annual KoblJam hosted by Twitch.tv/koboldsprigg!

You are the Mirror Guardian knight!

A and D to move

W to jump

Press Space to kick

R to reset

Shadows are defeat, stay near your lantern head, reach the mirror goal!

Game created by https://itch.io/profile/koboldsprigg and https://itch.io/profile/heiach!
